question: Your friend is celebrating her Birthday soon and has invited you to a party. But you are unable to come because you are going to attend an important meeting that day. Write a letter to your friend and * thank her for the invitation; * explain why you cannot come; * propose to meet on other day; Write at least 150 words. You do NOT need to write your own address. Begin your letter as follows:
text: Firstly,I heard that a great party is going to be thrown by you.It has given me  great Pleasure after receiving your Birthday Party Invitation.I am truly grateful to you for remembering me on this auspicious occasion.Although,I am so heartbroken to inform you that I could not attend the long-awaited get-together.Even though,We have been planning for the Big Day and the Fun we could experience.

Adding up more in it,Secondly,You were well aware as my best friend about the hard work I put in to win the deal of ABC Company,knowing that it is my dream to close that Sales deal.Subsequently,the CEO has Personally invited my whole Team including myself to deliver a Presentation in front of the Board of Directors.Since ,They are the most important client of our Organisation,Moreover,I have to attend by all means.Hence,The Birthday and presentation are clashing coincidently.

Also,I have an alternative Plan to enjoy one more celebration on coming Weekend,I owe you a dinner,Moreover,you are most welcome to invite other friends again.So Finally it is decided that we are meeting on Friday for the big event.Therefore,Excuses are not acceptable.
Please accept my regret,and looking forward to meeting you on Friday at ABC CAFE.
